sn22.76:2.4: The nine “abodes of sentient beings” (sattāvāsā) are listed at (AN 9.24. The “pinnacle of existence” (bhavagga), also mentioned in passing at AN 4.75:1.3, is the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception (Vb 18:209.3, Kv 3.12:22.4).
sn22.76:8.1: The “ten qualities of an adept” are the eight path factors plus right knowledge and right freedom (AN 10.112).
sn22.76:10.1: Vikampati is also used in the context of the threefold conceit at SN 1.20:23.3 = Snp 4.9:8.3 and in the verses of Mahākassapa at Thag 18.1:26.4.
